<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Ma'at (The Feather of Truth)](/Deities.aspx?ID=55)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Defend civilization from chaos, live an honest and just life, be impartial in judgment and reveal the truth

**Anathema** Deal unfairly with your family or community, destroy the environment, lie

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, N

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

**Favored Weapon** [Starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=44)

**Domains** [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Star](/Domains.aspx?ID=52), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=32)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111)

- **4th**
[Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255)

- **5th**
[Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193)

</column>
name: Ma'at (The Feather of Truth)
